results.name: Type The Entire Of Ulysses. That's it. That's the game.

requirements_en.minimum:

  • Storage: 200 MB available space

Minimum:

  • OS: Windows® 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i3-3250 / AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 650 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 6870

  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible
